original_title: Gassed up Ricky’s Invasion of the Bong Tower
overview: In the Conclusion of the GRU trilogy, Donny with the help of Uncle Samsonite plan to break into the bong tower and stop Ricky once and for all.
tagline: Is the war finally over? Or has it only just begun?
title: Gassed up Ricky’s Invasion of the Bong Tower
